Package org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.tracing

Class BraveAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.tracing.BraveAutoConfiguration
@AutoConfiguration(before={MicrometerTracingAutoConfiguration.class,NoopTracerAutoConfiguration.class}) @ConditionalOnClass({brave.Tracer.class,io.micrometer.tracing.brave.bridge.BraveTracer.class}) @EnableConfigurationProperties(TracingProperties.class) @Import({org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.tracing.BravePropagationConfigurations.PropagationWithoutBaggage.class,org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.tracing.BravePropagationConfigurations.PropagationWithBaggage.class,org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.tracing.BravePropagationConfigurations.NoPropagation.class}) public class BraveAutoConfiguration extends Object

3.0.0
